What do you mean by my own generic server? Are you using a serverdef file of
your own?

I am using a modified server def file (trying to upgrade my JBoss 4 server
definition to the facet extension. For the time being I am simply changing the
plugin.xml and the serverdef file.

I suspect this is due to changes in the serverdef file. I am not able to
reproduce with my serverdefs
, can you send me your version so that I try to reproduce this bug.

Created an attachment (id=29870)
Modified serverdef plugin for my tests. 

If you replace the original one with this one it will reproduce the
StackOverflow. It requires a JBoss 4.0 installation ().

http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=22866&package_id=16942&release_id=365509

Your .serverdef file is invalid in line 27 there is refererence to a property
named serverRootDirectory but this property is not defined as a property.

Thanks for pointing that out. But still I think that the plugin should not run
into a StackOverflowError, but point out the mistake in the config file
Got permission from Simon to close this bug.
